com.linecorp.armeria.server.composition

Class CompositeServiceEntry<I extends Request,O extends Response>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.server.composition.CompositeServiceEntry<I,O>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the Request type
    O - the Response type

    public final class CompositeServiceEntry<I extends Request,O extends Response>
extends Object
    A pair of a PathMapping and a Service bound to it.
